nodes.text: Mairlenn was the female lead for Radanthus Mandelatara's production, Hearts of Empire. Sometime following the Battle of Yavin in 0 BBY, she lost her pet voorpak named Dotti to a pack of beasts. Angered, she demanded that Mandelatara find a way to 'punish' the beasts.
Mairlenn was mentioned in the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided.
